thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Aquaventure Holdings Limited Announces Qtrly ‍loss Per Share $0.25​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Aquaventure Holdings Limited Announces Qtrly ‍loss Per Share $0.25​
text:
March 1 (Reuters) - Aquaventure Holdings Ltd:
* AQUAVENTURE HOLDINGS LIMITED ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 EARNINGS RESULTS
* QTRLY ‍LOSS PER SHARE $0.25​ * SEES 2018 REVENUES $131 MILLION - $136 MILLION
* SEES 2018 ADJUSTED EBITDA $42 MILLION - $47 MILLION, USING ACCOUNTING STANDARDS IN EFFECT FROM JAN 1, 2018
* AQUAVENTURE HOLDINGS- BINDING AGREEMENT’S IMPACT WITH ABENGOA WATER TO BUY MAJORITY INTEREST IN A DESALINATION PLANT IN GHANA NOT PART OF 2018 OUTLOOK​
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-0.25, REVENUE VIEW $31.6 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
